contact.title: Contact
contact.heading: I'd Love to Hear From You!
contact.intro1: Thank you for visiting my website dedicated to the rich and delicious world of traditional Polish cuisine. Whether you're a lifelong fan of pierogi, a newcomer curious about bigos, or someone with a family recipe to share, I want to connect with you!
contact.intro2: Do you have questions about my recipes? Looking for cooking tips or recommendations on where to find authentic ingredients? Maybe you have your own Polish food stories and traditions that you'd like to share with me. Whatever it is, Iâ€™m excited to hear from you!
contact.intro3: Please fill out the form below to get in touch. Your feedback, questions, and stories are invaluable to me, and I can't wait to respond.

about.title: About
about.heading: A Culinary Journey
about.intro1: Cooking is not just a means to an end; it's a pathway to happiness, a form of meditation that brings fulfillment and joy. In a world that's increasingly fast-paced and stressful, the simple act of preparing a meal has become a sanctuary for many, myself included. It's where I find peace, relaxation, and a chance to recharge.
about.intro2: The kitchen is more than just a place to cook; it's a haven where time seems to stand still. Amidst the whirlwind of modern life, this is my retreat â€” a space where I can create, experiment, and nourish both body and soul. Join me on this culinary journey, where every recipe tells a story and every dish is crafted with love.

inspire.text: I hope that this website will not only inspire you in the kitchen to rediscover the tastes of older generations but will allow you, if only for a moment, to experience the unique smell of the forgotten Kresy region.
